data.title: About Lucille O'Neal: The story of Shaquille O'Neal's mom
data.meta_description: Who is Lucille O'Neal? She is famous for being the mother of former NBA player Shaquille O'Neal. Learn more about her life including her age and profession.
data.text:
When mentioning the best professional basketball players of all time, Shaquille O'Neal's name is a must-pick for many. The retired athlete's successful career saw him win significant trophies and awards. But do you know the secret behind his success? Motivativation from his parents, especially his mother. So, who is she, and what is Lucille O'Neal's story?

The saying behind every successful man, there is a woman, stands true in the life of Shaquille O'Neal. His mother has influenced him through education, self-denials, wisdom, and motivation. As a result of Lucille O'Neal's involvement in her son's success, fans are eager to know more about her.

Lucille O'Neal profile summary

Full nameLucille O'NealGenderFemaleDate of birth20 September 1954Age69 years old (as of 2023)Zodiac signVirgoPlace of birthDublin, Georgia, USACurrent residenceFlorida, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityAfrican-AmericanReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight in feet6'2"Height in centimetres188Hair colourBlackEye colourDark brownMotherOdessaMarital statusDivorcedEx-husbandPhillip Arthur HarrisonChildrenFourUniversityBethune-Cookman University, University of PhoenixProfessionAuthor, entrepreneurNet worth$200,000

Lucille O'Neal's biography

Lucille O'Neal is an American entrepreneur, philanthropist, and author famously known as the mother of former NBA player Shaquille O'Neal. She has gained popularity for her love and support of her son and his siblings.

What is Lucille O'Neal's date of birth? She was born on 20 September 1954 in Dublin, Georgia, USA. Lucille is 69 years old (as of 2023), and her zodiac sign is Virgo.

Lucille O'Neal's parents

According to CBN, Lucille and her siblings were raised by their grandparents after their parents divorced when she was three. During the divorce, their father took them and moved. However, after a few years, Lucille's mother, Odessa, re-entered their lives.

Lucille attended elementary and high school locally. However, she cut her education short after getting pregnant with her first child. Years later, in 1999, she resumed her studies in an Adult Education Program at Bethune-Cookman University.

She graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration in June 2003. Lucille also completed her graduate program (Master of Arts in Organisational Management) at the University of Phoenix in March 2005. In 2016, Bethune-Cookman University honoured her with a Doctor of Humane Letters degree, earning her the designation Dr.

Career

Lucille O'Neal is an American businessman, author, spokesperson and philanthropist. She and other mothers co-founded the Mothers of Professional Basketball Players Association (MPBP) in 1996. She served as the executive secretary from (1996 to 2000) and as president for some time since 2017.

Lucille is also an author and motivational speaker. She has published a book, Walk Like You Have Somewhere to Go: From Mental Welfare to Mental Wealth, chronicling her journey from turmoil to finding her purpose. In addition to her book, Shaq's mom often speaks at various events, sharing her experiences and insights.

Lucille O'Neal's net worth

Shaquille O'Neal's mother has a reported net worth of $200,000. Her source of income includes sales from her books, motivational speaking and business ventures.

Lucille O'Neal and Joe Toney

Lucille's first romantic relationship was with her high school sweetheart, Joe Toney. Their relationship led to the birth of their first child, Shaquille, on 6 March 1972. However, Toney struggled with drug addiction. While his son was still an infant, Toney received jail time for drug possession. He took no part in his son's upbringing when he exited prison.

Lucille O'Neal and Phillip Harrison

Lucille met Phillip Harrison, a military man, in 1974 in Newark, New Jersey, USA. They dated for a while before marrying sometime later. Their union resulted in the birth of three children, namely Lateefah, Ayesha, and Jamal.

However, after years of a rocky marriage, the pair divorced in 2002. Phillip died years later in 2013, aged 66.

Lucille O'Neal's children

The celebrity mom has four children: two sons and two daughters. They included Shaquille, Lateefah, Ayesha, and Jamal.

Lucille O'Neal's house

Did Shaq buy his mother a house? Yes, he did. According to The Sports Rush, in 1992, Shaq used his first $1 million paycheck to purchase a home for his mother. He did it after being drafted by the Orlando Magic in 1992.

FAQs

Who is Lucille O'Neal? Lucille is an American entrepreneur and philanthropist famously known as Shaquille O'Neal's mother.

How old is Lucille O'Neal? She is 69 years old (as of 2023), having been born on 20 September 1954.

Is Lucille O'Neal alive? Yes, Shaq's mom is alive and well. She is reportedly residing in Florida, USA.

What is Lucille O'Neal's Instagram? Shaquille O'Neal's mom doesn't have an Instagram account in her name.

What is Lucille O Neal a doctor of? She is a Doctor of Humane Letters, an honorary degree awarded to individuals who have distinguished themselves in philanthropy and welfare-related fields.

Who is Shaq's biological father? Shaq's birth father's name is Joe Toney.

Does Shaq take care of his parents? Yes, he does. The former NBA star used his first paycheck in 1992 to buy his mom a new house and his stepdad a new car.

Final word on Lucille O'Neal

Lucille O'Neal is an American businesswoman and philanthropist. She is famously known for being the mother of NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal. Her story of how she raised Shaq as a single mother and his three siblings has captivated fans' minds.
